title: Day Of The Dead
description: As gods gamble and dance with destiny, mortal fates are trampled without a second thought.  Ambjorn and his wife Jofrid must face theirs, when the peace of their home village is suddenly shattered. They have to throw themselves into a game in which every move carries high consequence. Is it possible to win when playing against forces beyond your own comprehension?  Day of the dead is an action-packed short story that touches the story depicted in the novel Fargoer. This time, the focus is turned towards Vikings and their gloom-filled world.
author: Petteri Hannila
